response.overview: Amidst the radio crackle of coded noise and scrambled signals, the sounds of a theremin can just be made out. Grounded in the Shetland Islands, a pilot dreams of flying, while through the London smog a librarian gazes out at the stars.  Little do they know, somewhere out there, something is listening.
response.tagline: Amidst the radio crackle of coded noise and scrambled signals, the sounds of a theremin can just be made out. Grounded in the Shetland Islands, a pilot dreams of flying, while through the London smog a librarian gazes out at the stars.
response.title: A Flight of Fancy
